content: *april 2011 okerilla 1 has kindly written a spanish version of the pattern and posted it on her blog juntitos 2 gracias okerilla * *december 2011 a brand new version is now available happy new year everyone * worked from the top down this raglan hoodie is easy to work up and finish this makes a great gift because well you can never have enough hoodies 1 http //www ravelry com/people/okerilla 2 http //juntitoscrafts blogspot com/2011/04/chaqueta-con-capucha-para-todos-los html
